a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of pregnant women vs. share of children who have anemia, 2000
The estimated share of people who have anemia. Anemia is a condition that develops when your blood lacks
enough healthy red blood cells or hemoglobin.
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024); Our World In Data
